RHighlight.p: We loved the ‘brand new’ feel of villa, its spaciousness, and the sheer number of places to hang out. The pool’s length will delight serious swimmers as much as those content to wallow in the shallows. And witnessing a glorious ocean sunset from your bath or star-gazing from the rooftop deck wasn’t too shabby either!

RSurroundArea.p: Villa Anucara does feel off the beaten track and may not be top of the list for those focused on shopping and clubbing, but those who enjoy rural rice-paddy seclusion couldn’t be better placed. The serenade of thunderous surf that funnels through the villa was a constant reminder of the powerful sea that pulverizes the volcanic sands of this magnificent coast, and was a prompt for some pleasurable early morning and sunset walks. Within a few minutes’ of the villa, on a rocky spur reached by a small causeway, we were delighted to find a wind-swept, water-buffeted sea temple topped with plumes of spray from a dramatic blow hole — this surely gives its famous tourist-thronging neighbour, Tanah Lot, a run for its money.

ROverallComments.p: Villa Anucara’s stark, modernist design may not suit everyone — stripped of its Indonesian artefacts, it could be at home in Miami, Monaco or any number of expensive beachside playgrounds. But this reviewer swooned over the purity of the design, pleasing symmetry, and sense of space and light. The white and ivory colours splashed with aqua create a restful and restorative palette to counter the rectilinear strictness of the architecture. We liked the counterbalance of avant garde with antique, the textural play with Palimanan stone, teakwood planks, polished concrete, fossilized wood, gnarled tree roots and granite. And we loved the artistic flourishes and deliciously thought out details.

One overlooked detail, however, was the choice of cut flowers in every room: the garishly coloured marigolds seemed out of place in such sophisticated surroundings (even the flowers in the garden are all pure white). But this small ‘peeve’ will easily dissipate when the owner’s impeccable taste directs the staff’s flower arranging skills. (And let’s face it, how uptight do you have to be to even notice!)

Unusually, those who don’t draw straws for the master suites will not feel short-changed. (Magnificent though our master suite was, we would have been delighted to stay in guestroom 3 with its shaded grove of palms and its stunning outdoor bathroom with monsoon shower arch and lava-stone wall of water cascading down to a sunken hamam-style bath.) In this respect the villa is highly suited to groups of friends and families — who will also appreciate the many private spaces that allow for quiet as well as social holiday time. We would perhaps be nervous of bringing very young children here because of the stretches of unfenced water, unguarded stairs and upper deck, but note that baby cots and high chairs can be provided; indeed the party before us included several toddlers — and they stayed for a month!

RUnpleasantSurprise.p: Given the brand spanking newness of the villa, the absence of TVs in the bedrooms was a surprise (a pleasant one to us but perhaps not to others). We also noted the absence of DVDs or books but no doubt these will come in time. Some of the non-air-conditioned spaces could benefit from overhead fans when the sea breeze forgets to switch on. The slightly ‘high’ smell in a few of the bathrooms may well have been a seasonal issue. And though the wild seas of this rugged coastline preclude swimming, who minds when you have your own 30m pool to splash around in!

REVIEW.Name: JIEWEN SHEN
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Love the staff, can't wait to go back.

REVIEW.Name: Glenn Gunara-Chen
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This villa is highly recommended for groups. Staff are perfect and the freshly cooked food awesome! Facilities are first class and well maintained.

REVIEW.Name: Lisa Allen
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This is a brilliant villa, with terrific staff in lovely grounds. There's lots to do around the villa including beach walks and visits to temples. The staff are only too happy to organise visits by spa therapists and yoga professionals. The food is authentic and delicious. We could not have asked for more.

REVIEW.Name: April Penny
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Great villa, great staff! Loved our stay and will definitely be back.

REVIEW.Name: WUHU MILLIONAIRE
REVIEW.ROverallComments: wonderful place, our clients are very pleased and satisfied with this villa and highly recommend!

REVIEW.Name: Bali Harmony wedding
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We stayed here for three nights for our wedding and it was AMAZING! The staff were all so lovely and very accommodating to our needs. Thank you so much for your hard work, we would love to come back again.

REVIEW.Name: Of Villas Ministry
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We were confused by the pictures we saw on the website and decided to try staying here for two nights and it was amazing, so peaceful and quiet, the staff was really make you feel at home. We enjoy it very much. Usually you get Butlers at other villa, who pretty much is a standard hotel service but in here the service makes our stay very comfortable. What I would like to recommend is a lot of villas have a great view and facilities but not this kind of service, so I definitely will come back here for another annual holiday.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Good service, beautiful place, the staff are lovely and friendly. Food delicious and the swimming pool is great for the children. Thank you so much! We love Bali and the villa.

REVIEW.Name: Yuan Ye James
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Excellent service! Room are clean and the food is tasty. Children enjoyed the swimming pool a lot. We like the design of this villa very much. We took a lot of photos and would like to show to our friends. What a wonderful vacation. We will definitely come back here for our holiday!

REVIEW.Name: Pierre Dubois
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What a fantastic week! The villa is gorgeous and the service is excellent. We particularly appreciated the kindness of the staff. Thank you for making us feel at home and fulfilling all the wishes. Food is very yummy! We will not easily forget the taste of Ayam Bumbu Bali. Thank you for your hard work.

REVIEW.Name: Maison De Luxe Ltd.
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Wonderful holiday vacation. We enjoyed every minute at this wonderful place! Many thanks to the whole staff who provided great service. Very grateful to have experienced this villa! With pleasure will be back.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Griyasari Tours & Travel / Lime Property Bali/ Bali Escape Travel & Tourism
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We stayed here for 3 nights. Our stay was memorable. The highlight of the stay was the excellent service of the staff. The Villa Manager - Nyoman very helpful and always gave the right advice. They never gave ‘No’ for an answer. The food quality was also very good.

REVIEW.Name: Luxury Retreats
REVIEW.ROverallComments: It was so great to stay here. Food was perfect and staff was awesome. Everything worked so smoothly and pool was nice. Definitely one of the coolest and nicest place ever visited.

REVIEW.Name: Onefine stay/Travel Keys Onefine stay/Travel Keys
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for all your amazing hospitality, it was such a memorable experience, once in a life time.

REVIEW.Name: Carina Tan
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Our impression of the villa - beautiful and well maintained landscape and surroundings, spectacular infinity pool, breath taking views, architecturally spacious and modern main house, food delicious and well presented. Great, helpful, kind, accommodating and courteous staff who made our stay comfortable, convenient, pleasant, relaxing and easy. Our special thanks to Nyoman and Made. We will definitely come back to Bali and recommend the villa to our family and friends in the Philippines and all the world.

REVIEW.Name: Daven Lee
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Excellent service! Comfortable accommodation. Would definitely recommend this beautiful spacious villa to everyone. Had awesome and amazing moments during my stay here. Thank you to all the team!

REVIEW.Name: Bernadette Kelly
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Fantastic staff, fantastic time. Friendly and helpful staff and beautiful villa. We had an amazing time. You guys are the best. Thanks for everything, a wonderful stay. We will definitely be back next year!

REVIEW.Name: Christine Indonet Travel, PT
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for a wonderful stay here at Villa Anucara. The setting was spectacular which was made even more enjoyable by the remarkable service. It has been a great few days celebrating our friends wedding at the villa down the road.

REVIEW.Name: Dawn Canale
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for the best holiday experience I have ever had. Villa Anucara is the most beautiful place I had stayed at. I want to say a special thank you to all the staff, the service was amazing and the meals were perfect. Thank you again and thank you Nyoman. You have been the perfect host and I will be telling all my friends about Villa Anucara.

REVIEW.Name: Keith Ong
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Awesome stay with all our needs being looked after. Every need and attention to details are looked after by the very efficient staff which are so well trained and service oriented. Keep up the good work. The Villa Manager and his team are very good and give a very Balinese way of service. Thank you very much.

REVIEW.Name: GRABAPAD (PT. RUMAH BAHAGIA)
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Beautiful villa with fantastic staff. I highly recommend this villa.

REVIEW.Name: Rebecca Stanbury
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for a fantastic stay. We loved the food, the snacks but mostly the smiles from the staff. What a beautiful villa in a beautiful and peaceful area. We hope to return.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Beautiful villa with great staff. Would recommend to a friend, had a great stay.

REVIEW.Name: In Style Travel - Poland
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you very much for your efforts. Every morning started in a good, special and extremely nice way. The whole day you were ready to help, to serve what we want, to service, to ask us for our current problems/possibilities of help. Due to the above, we would like to thank you from the bottom of our hearts that we could rest (after a hard work year) in such comfortable conditions. Nyoman 5-star service! Hope to see you again.

REVIEW.Name: Sense Luxury Sense Luxury
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Very beautiful villa with an awesome staff. We want to say thank you to all the staff, especially to the Manager - always ready to help us with everything. All the staff was very nice and always with smile. We had a fantastic journey here and hope to be back soon.

REVIEW.Name: Sandra Devahasdin
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Our family celebrated a joint 21st birthday here at lovely Villa Anucara. We had a wonderful time. Nyoman was wonderful - arranging everything with efficient professionalism and big smile.

REVIEW.Name: Holiday Villa Rental Bali Villa Escapes
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We are so grateful to be given the possibility to enjoy this lovely place and the presence of the marvelous staff which fully satisfied our needs. We would like to thank you from the bottom of our hearts for this unique experience you have given us and will remember this holiday as one of the best.

REVIEW.Name: C Asia Pte., Ltd Villa-Finder.com
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What a great weekend. Villa brilliant and awesome, no complaint. Garden and pool very relaxing, staff outstanding, great service, great food and great attitude, will be back and HIGHLY recommend, try the avocado and papaya salad.

REVIEW.Name: Sugar Marry (Partnering with Bali Exotic Wedding)
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What a nice place! The staff are all friendly and nice, thank you so much for your effort. This villa is so beautiful and also food is wonderful. Thank you so much!

REVIEW.Name: Holiday Villa Rental Bali Villa Escapes
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Fantastic villa, great location and beautiful layout. The staff were amazing, always helpful and they always had a smile on their face. Nyoman was excellent as a Villa Manager. He went out of his way to help us and made our stay unforgettable. Would recommend to everyone.

REVIEW.Name: Sugar Marry (Partnering with Bali Exotic Wedding)
REVIEW.ROverallComments: I was really happy staying here. All staff are very nice and lovely. Always smiling. Rooms and all things were great. We had one of the most memorable times in this villa. Special thanks to Mr. Nyoman. He is one of the best managers I’ve ever met through out my life experiences. He was always ready to help with a mindful and respectful manner. Thanks to everyone here and hope to stay here in the near future.

REVIEW.Name: Sense Luxury Sense Luxury
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The villa is very comfortable and beautiful, we enjoy every second of staying here. The services are great and I think we have a great relationship with staff in only 4 days. I think I will recommend the villa to all Chinese travelers.

REVIEW.Name: Gerhard Regele
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A long distance flight of 17 hours. A lot of traffic overall in Denpasar and the door of the villa opens and behind there is a piece of paradise. We have wonderful days and enjoyed the friendly and professional staff, fantastic dinner and the comfort of the villa. Mr Nyoman did a great job and was always there if you need him. After eleven nights we are very sad because the moment now is to say goodbye. Thank you very much, we have a wonderful stay in a five-star villa with best service. We hope to be back soon.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Gita.CV Bali Gita.CV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Please convoy the message to Villa Ombak Putih TEAM, Thanks you for your great service and sense of anticipating guest needs. Our client are happy and enjoy the villa very much but a bit far away from shopping and restaurants and traffic jam make them frustration.

REVIEW.Name: Lala Tamara
REVIEW.ROverallComments: I had great time during my stay in Villa ombak putih. The villa is beautiful, clean, staff great, friendly and pleasant. Cheff is excellent. The rooms are crisp clean and bed are comfy, i had a good sleep and relaxing time! Would be perfect if sound system and wifi work, and also addition warm water enough for whole rooms. But besides that i had amazing time staying in this villa! Would definately come back for next time! And recommend to my friends. Thank you for having us!
